resources.string: Some androids do not support running a Chart or progress bar. Chart or Progress bar is not stable when used on android nougat and below

This robot can generate a minimum of 3% profit for you and a minimum of 1% for your sponsor. But plucky robots can also lose. If the robot does not generate profit doge, then the Plucky system will automatically replace it with a Plucky wallet that you can sell or use for upgrades.
You put too many doge deposits in, please withdraw all and enter with the correct nominal, or please upgrade your Plucky membership.
